formulas.name: AvailbilityCheckMessgae
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!AvailebilityCheckOnAsset.firstRetrievedRecord.Id}), "", "The asset is already taken in the specified date range")

formulas.name: ProductVacancyCheck
formulas.expression: IF( ISNULL({!FilteredOrderesFetcher.firstRetrievedRecord.Id}), "This product is occupied", "This product is free to sell for the proposed date range")

formulas.name: QueryAvailebilityCurrentProducts
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, UnitPrice, Quantity, Access_Type__c, Account_Contract__c, EndDate, ServiceDate, TotalPrice, Contract__r.Account.Name , Contract__c FROM OrderItem where PricebookEntryId= '"& {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.PricebookEntryId} &"' AND Order.Contract.Status ='Activated' "

formulas.name: QueryFilteredOpprotunities
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Access_Type__c, End_date__c, Entry_Date__c, Opportunity__c, Quantity, TotalPrice FROM OpportunityLineItem where PricebookEntryId= '" & {!FilteredProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Id} &"' AND Opportunity.StageName NOT IN ('Closed Won', 'Closed Lost') AND OpportunityId != '" & {!recordId.Id}& "'"

formulas.name: QueryFilteredOrders
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, UnitPrice, Quantity, Access_Type__c, Account_Contract__c, EndDate, ServiceDate, TotalPrice, Contract__r.Account.Name FROM OrderItem where PricebookEntryId= '" & {!FilteredProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Id} &"' AND Order.Contract.Status ='Activated' "

formulas.name: QueryFilteredProductsFetcher
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Product2Id, Capacity_Desks__c, Size_m__c, UnitPrice, Floor__c, Window__c, Minimum_Price__c, Destination_Price__c , Last_Price__c, Calculated_Price__c, Product2.Type__c FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '"+ {!ProductSubtype2.value} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!recordId.Location__c}+"'"

formulas.name: QueryOrderLinesAvailebilityCurrentFilteredProduct
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, UnitPrice, Quantity, Access_Type__c, Account_Contract__c, EndDate, ServiceDate, TotalPrice, Contract__r.Account.Name FROM OrderItem where PricebookEntryId= '" & {!FilteredProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Id} &"' AND Order.Contract.Status ='Activated' AND EndDate > " & TEXT({!Entry_Date}) & " AND ServiceDate < " & TEXT({!End_Date}) &" "

formulas.name: QueryPackageCurrentProducts
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Type__c, Access_Type__c, End_date__c, Entry_Date__c , Quantity , TotalPrice, PricebookEntryId, Capicity_Desks__c, Description, End_Date_Time__c, Entry_Date_Time__c, ListPrice, Name, Product_Name__c, Product2.Capacity_Desks__c, Product2.Floor__c, Product2.Size_m2__c, Product2.Sub_Type__c, Temporary__c, ServiceDate, UnitPrice FROM OpportunityLineItem where OpportunityId = '" & {!recordId.Id} & "' AND Access_Type__c != '" & {!RemoveProductAction.Results.Flow__InterviewGuid} &"'"

formulas.name: ValidationForEntryDate
formulas.expression: IF( {!FormulaCurrentDeskCount} > 75, "Choosing this product will exceed the cap of 75 desks for monthly products, therefore you cannot continue", "The date is not in the range of the opportunity." )

validationRule.formulaExpression: IF( {!ProductAccessType.value} != 'Periodic', TRUE, IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Contract_Type__c}, 'Periodic')), TRUE, IF( {!End_Date} <= {!recordId.End_Date__c}, TRUE, FALSE ) ) )

fields.name: ErrorMessageDateFields
fields.fieldText:
The dates are not within range of the opportunity

{!recordId.Start_Date__c} - {!recordId.End_Date__c}

fields.name: DisplayCalculatedPriceForPeriodic
fields.fieldText:
The contract term in months: {!PeriodicCalculateTerm}

The calculated total price is: {!PeriodicCalculatedPrice}

fields.name: DisplayDeskCountErrorForMonthly
fields.fieldText:
Current Desk Count Excluding Temporary:

{!FormulaCurrentDeskCount}

Be careful not to exceed the count limit of 75 desks for monthly contracts

actions.name: RemoveProductAction
actions.label: Opportunity Package Builder - Manage Opportunity Products

fields.name: CurrentpProductDetails
fields.fieldText:
Product Details


Desks #: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Capicity_Desks__c}


Quantity: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Quantity}


Temporary: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Temporary__c}


Floor: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Product2.Floor__c}


Size: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Product2.Size_m2__c} 


Window: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Product2.Window__c} 


Notes: {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Description}


Date range:

{!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Entry_Date_Time__c}

{!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.Entry_Date__c} - {!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.End_date__c}{!PackageCurrentProductsTable.firstSelectedRow.End_Date_Time__c}
